meanings.definition: A solid figure having ten faces.
meanings.sent1: I learned about decahedrons in geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The artist created beautiful decahedrons out of paper.

meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of decahedrons, each representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The decahedrons in the exhibit sparkled under the lights.
